author: doll
msg: Made the Enum opensocial class a little more flexible. It now has a constructor which just takes in just a key, and the Enum class provides a default display value. (Which of course can be overriden using the two param constructor)
Also removed the localization todo from the setDisplayValue method as pojos should just be simple data holders. Localization logic should go behind the service interfaces for each container.

author: dkulp
msg: Create a cxf-all.xml file at bundle time to make using the osgi stuff in smx a little easier.

author: dims
msg: Fix for AXIS2-3627 - GenericProviderDispatcher in default war's axis2.xml
